mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ARTICLE (ARTICLE_ID, BOARD_ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, TITLE, CONTENTS, PARENT_ID, READ_COUNT, REG_DTM) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{boardId}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{parentId}, 0, sysdate)
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE (NOTICE_ID, ARTICLE_ID, NOTICE_STT_DTM, NOTICE_END_DTM) VALUES (TB_NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{articleId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '14' DAY))
mapper.select: SELECT ARTICLE_ID , COUNT(ARTICLE_ID) AS READ_COUNT --, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(ARTICLE_ID) DESC) AS READ_COUNT_RANK FROM TB_ARTICLE_READ_COUNT GROUP BY ARTICLE_ID

SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID , COUNT(B.ARTICLE_ID) AS COMMENT_COUNT --, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(B.ARTICLE_ID) DESC) AS COMMENT_COUNT_RANK FROM TB_COMMENT B , TB_ARTICLE A WHERE B.ARTICLE_ID (+) = A.ARTICLE_ID GROUP BY A.ARTICLE_ID
